text: Customizations allow you to configure and adjust your experience with Homarr to your preferences.

layout.name: Layout
layout.description: Enable and disable elements on your header and dashboard tiles

gridstack.name: Gridstack
gridstack.description: Customize the behaviour and columns of your dashboard area

appereance.name: Appearance
appereance.description: Customize the background, colors and apps appearance

accessibility.name: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Configure Homarr for disabled and handicapped users
